segments.text: Are you enjoying your trip to New Orleans ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I really like it here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to do something tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's see . Have you been to a jazz club yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've already been to several clubs here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . What about an evening riverboat tour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh , actually , I've gone twice this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what do you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I haven't been to the theater in a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , OK . I hear there's a terrific show at the Sanger Theater .
segments.speaker: S1
